title: Sketchy
description:
Jake Hart, Mike Cho, and Duchess share stories about trying to get fired, a bad boyfriend, and rescuing a friend from a pimp.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

Hire Kevin Allison as a coach at KevinAllison.com
author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (6ix Toys, Jake Hart, Creedence Clearwater Revival, Generationals, Duchess, Miami Horror, Jeff Barr, Kevin Allison, Mike Cho)
